```{r}
library(ccdata)
library(ccanonym)
load('demg.RData')
names(demg)
sdc <- create.sdc(demg, 'data/test.yaml')
print(sdc)

## Local suppression
```{r}
sdc <- localSuppression(sdc, k=5)
print(sdc)
print(which(is.na(sdc@manipKeyVars$GPCODE)))
print(which(is.na(demg$GPCODE)))
```


## Microaggregation
```{r}
sdc <- microaggregation(sdc)
print(sdc)
```

## Add noise

```{r}
sdc <- addNoise(sdc)
print(sdc)
```

## l-diversity
```{r}
sdc <- ldiversity(sdc)
print(sdc@risk$global)
print(head(sdc@risk$individual))
print(sdc@risk$ldiversity)
```
